verses.verse: These also are <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> which the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> copied <S%H6275>out.<s%>
It is the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H5641>conceal<s%> a <S%H1697>thing,<s%> but the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%> is to search <S%H2713>out<s%> a <S%H1697>matter.<s%>
As the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> for <S%H7312>height,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> for <S%H6011>depth,<s%> so the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%> are <S%H2714>unsearchable.<s%>
Take <S%H1898>away<s%> the <S%H5509>dross<s%> from the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3627>material<s%> comes <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H6884>refiner;<s%>
Take <S%H1898>away<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6440>presence,<s%> and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> will be <S%H3559>established<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>
<S%H1921>Don't<s%> exalt yourself in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> or <S%H5975>claim<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> among great <S%H1419>men;<s%>

for it is <S%H2896>better<s%> that it be <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5927>you,<s%> "Come up <S%H8213>here,<s%>" than that you should be put lower in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H5081>prince,<s%> whom your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen.<s%>
<S%H4118>Don't<s%> be hasty in <S%H3318>bringing<s%> <S%H7378>charges<s%> to <S%H6213>court.<s%> What will you do in the <S%H319>end<s%> when your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> shames <S%H3637>you?<s%>
<S%H7378>Debate<s%> your <S%H7379>case<s%> with your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H1540>don't<s%> betray the <S%H5475>confidence<s%> of <S%H312>another;<s%>
lest one who <S%H8085>hears<s%> it put you to <S%H2616>shame,<s%> and your bad <S%H1681>reputation<s%> never <S%H7725>depart.<s%>
A <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H212>fitly<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%> is like <S%H8598>apples<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in <S%H4906>settings<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
As an <S%H5141>earring<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and an <S%H2481>ornament<s%> of fine <S%H3800>gold,<s%> so is a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3198>reprover<s%> to an <S%H8085>obedient<s%> <S%H241>ear.<s%>

As the <S%H6793>cold<s%> of <S%H7950>snow<s%> in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> so is a <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6735>messenger<s%> to those who <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H7725>him;<s%> for he refreshes the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of his <S%H113>masters.<s%>
As <S%H5387>clouds<s%> and <S%H7307>wind<s%> without <S%H1653>rain,<s%> so is <S%H376>he<s%> who <S%H1984>boasts<s%> of <S%H4991>gifts<s%> <S%H8267>deceptively.<s%>
<S%H753>By<s%> <S%H639>patience<s%> a <S%H7101>ruler<s%> is <S%H6601>persuaded.<s%> A <S%H7390>soft<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H7665>breaks<s%> the <S%H1634>bone.<s%>
Have you <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1706>honey?<s%> <S%H398>Eat<s%> as much as is <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> for <S%H7646>you,<s%> lest you eat too much, and vomit <S%H6958>it.<s%>
Let your <S%H7272>foot<s%> be <S%H3365>seldom<s%> in your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> lest he be <S%H7646>weary<s%> of <S%H8130>you,<s%> and hate you.

A <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H6030>gives<s%> <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>testimony<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> is like a <S%H4650>club,<s%> a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> or a <S%H8150>sharp<s%> <S%H2671>arrow.<s%>
<S%H4009>Confidence<s%> in someone <S%H898>unfaithful<s%> in <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%> is like a <S%H7465>bad<s%> <S%H8127>tooth,<s%> or a <S%H4154>lame<s%> <S%H7272>foot.<s%>

As one who takes <S%H5710>away<s%> a <S%H899>garment<s%> in <S%H7135>cold<s%> <S%H3117>weather,<s%> or <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> on <S%H5427>soda,<s%> so is one who <S%H7891>sings<s%> <S%H7892>songs<s%> to a <S%H7451>heavy<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
If your <S%H8130>enemy<s%> is <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> give him <S%H3899>food<s%> to <S%H398>eat.<s%> If he is <S%H6771>thirsty,<s%> give him <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8248>drink:<s%>
for you will <S%H2846>heap<s%> coals of <S%H1513>fire<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will reward <S%H7999>you.<s%>
The <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> brings <S%H2342>forth<s%> <S%H1653>rain:<s%> so a <S%H5643>backbiting<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> brings an <S%H2194>angry<s%> <S%H6440>face.<s%>

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6438>corner<s%> of the <S%H1406>housetop,<s%> than to <S%H2267>share<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> with a <S%H4079>contentious<s%> <S%H802>woman.<s%>
Like <S%H7119>cold<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> to a <S%H5889>thirsty<s%> <S%H5315>soul,<s%> so is <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8052>news<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%>

Like a <S%H7515>muddied<s%> <S%H4599>spring,<s%> and a <S%H7843>polluted<s%> <S%H4726>well,<s%> so is a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man who <S%H4131>gives<s%> way <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
It is not <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H1706>honey;<s%> nor is it <S%H3519>honorable<s%> to <S%H2714>seek<s%> <S%H3519>one<s%>'s own honor.
Like a <S%H5892>city<s%> that is broken <S%H6555>down<s%> and without <S%H2346>walls<s%> is a <S%H376>man<s%> whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is without <S%H4623>restraint.<s%>
